form.label: Cron Toolkit - Schedule Builder
form.description: Build and visualize new cron schedules.

search.query: | makeresults | eval schedule="$schedule$", start_time="$start_time$", end_time="$end_time$" | eval start_time=case(start_time == "now", now(), isnull(start_time) OR start_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), start_time)) | eval end_time=case(end_time == "now", now(), isnull(end_time) OR end_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), end_time)) | croncountruns schedule=schedule start=start_time end=end_time limit=$limit$ | fields trigger_count

| makeresults | eval schedule="$schedule$", start_time="$start_time$", end_time="$end_time$" | eval start_time=case(start_time == "now", now(), isnull(start_time) OR start_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), start_time)) | eval end_time=case(end_time == "now", now(), isnull(end_time) OR end_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), end_time)) | croncountruns schedule=schedule start=start_time end=end_time limit=$limit$ | eval current_time=strftime(_time, "%c") | eval first_trigger_time=strftime(first_trigger_time, "%c") | eval last_trigger_time=strftime(last_trigger_time, "%c") | table current_time first_trigger_time last_trigger_time | rename current_time as "Current Time", first_trigger_time as "First Trigger Time", last_trigger_time as "Last Trigger Time"

| makeresults | eval schedule="$schedule$", start_time="$start_time$", end_time="$end_time$" | eval start_time=case(start_time == "now", now(), isnull(start_time) OR start_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), start_time)) | eval end_time=case(end_time == "now", now(), isnull(end_time) OR end_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), end_time)) | cronlistruns schedule=schedule start=start_time end=end_time limit=$limit$ | mvexpand triggers | rename triggers as _time | table _time schedule
